name: Root N' Shoot N' Cowboys
description:
Made for Brisbane Global Game Jam 2023!

Player 1 - Move with 'Right Arrow' - Turn & Fire with 'Left Arrow'

Player 2 - Move with 'A' - Turn & Fire with 'D'

Take a step every time you read a number.

Turn to face your opponent when you read "Shoot" or "Fire".

Made by Tex Barnes
